short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights items in doordash menu based on the dietary restrictions and allergies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Support Vegetarian, Vegetarian (No Egg), Vegan and Pescatarian diets. 
- Add allergies and highlight allergic items in red. Set allergies in the extension options.

Upcoming improvements:
Currently, I do a manual, rule based identification of items for dietary restrictions. I am hoping to add AI based identifier.
